articles.author: Jim Sciutto
articles.title: Trump will pull US out of NATO if he wins election, ex-adviser warns - CNN
articles.description: As US allies reel from Donald Trump’s weekend comments encouraging Russia to attack European allies if they don’t meet NATO budget contribution goals, multiple former Trump advisers warn in my upcoming book that the former president will seek to formally with…
